Class CharacterController

java.lang.Object
controller.character.CharacterController
public class CharacterController extends Object
The controller class for the Character element. Contains all the tool for the operator to use the character objects through the MVC architecture. It can: - Send character info to the view - Send a signal to drink a potion to the model and display it's success - Send a signal to eat food to the model and display it's success - Send a signal to heal to the model and display it's success - Send a signal to modify the hunger level to the model and display it's state

    • CharacterController

      public CharacterController(Character character, CharacterView view)
      Creates a CharacterController object. will make a relation with it's model and view.
      Parameters:
      character - Character to control.
      view - The view that will show this character's info.

    • showCharacter

      public void showCharacter()
      Sends the character given in parameters to the view to be shown.
      Parameters:
      character - Character to be shown.

    • drinkPotion

      public void drinkPotion(MagicPotion potion)
      Attemps to drink a magic potion. Sends the signal to the model and displays the messages that it returns with the view.
      Parameters:
      potion - The potion to drink.

    • eatFood

      Attemps to eat food. Sends the signal to the model and displays the messages that it returns with the view.
      Parameters:
      potion - The food to eat.

      Attemps to heal. Sends the signal to the model and displays the messages that it returns with the view.

    • modifyHunger

      public void modifyHunger(int amount)
      Attemps to modify the hunger level of the character. Sends the signal to the model and displays the messages that it returns with the view.
      Parameters:
      potion - The amount of hunger to vary of.
